trans-unit.source: Provides event data for the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"></xref> class.
The RoleManagerEventArgs object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.

The RoleManagerEventArgs object provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request, and a `Boolean`<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> property is used to enable or cancel creation of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by the<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.

Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs"></xref> class and sets the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.Context*> property to the specified <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> object provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request, and a `Boolean`<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> property is used to enable or cancel creation of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> of the current request.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.
The Context property provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request.
The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request
Gets or sets a value indicating whether role information has been applied to the current user.
The RolesPopulated property is used to enable or cancel creation of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.

If set to `true` in the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> assumes that role membership for the current user has been verified and any required role membership information has been set up for the current user.
No action is taken by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> to create a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object for the current user.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if role information has been applied to the current user; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
